commands.Name: BOA-APP-DATA
commands.RunCode:
Go code to start your app, get and evaluate the commands received, 
and implement the help command can be generated from the GUI. The 
current implementation creates three source files, main.go, runner.go 
and help.go.

commands.Name: --gui
commands.ShortHelp: gui causes boa constructor to generate Gui friendly help and run schemes

commands.Name: --mdhelp
commands.ShortHelp: mdhelp is a boolean command to cause help generation to generate markdown content.

commands.Name: file
commands.ShortHelp: open a .json file to start the session.
